fields.name: SQL Injection
fields.description: Tests if API endpoints are vulnerable to SQL injection, a common attack vector.

fields.name: XSS
fields.description: Tests for Cross-Site Scripting vulnerabilities where malicious scripts are injected into trusted websites.

fields.name: CSRF
fields.description: Checks if the API is susceptible to Cross-Site Request Forgery, allowing unauthorized commands from a trusted user.

fields.name: Command Injection
fields.description: Tests if backend systems are vulnerable to OS command injections.

fields.name: Broken Authentication
fields.description: Simulates automated attacks to identify weak spots in authentication mechanisms.

fields.name: Sensitive Data Exposure
fields.description: Tests to see how well sensitive data is protected during transmission and at rest.

fields.name: XML External Entities (XXE)
fields.description: Looks for vulnerabilities that allow an attacker to interfere with an application's processing of XML data.

fields.name: Insecure Deserialization
fields.description: Tests for flaws that could lead to remote code execution, replay attacks, or injection attacks.

fields.name: Security Misconfiguration
fields.description: Tests for commonly misconfigured security settings that might make the API vulnerable.
